data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Madre de Dios prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Madre de Dios, Peru

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Madre de Dios, Peru.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Madre de Dios who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 87,300 people in the state of Madre de Dios who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Cujareno, Mashco Piro people. Make the Cujareno, Mashco Piro people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Madre de Dios, Peru and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Madre de Dios, Peru.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 15,790 believers in Madre de Dios, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.
